mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Nathaniel West Dandridge to Ann Dandridge, 1785 April 13
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dandridge, Nathaniel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Acknowledges letter telling of his son's death--[Capt. Alexander Spotswood Dandridge]--what to do with land intended for his son--bring grandson to Hanover--does she have coat buttons of Scotch thistle which his son had?--he promised to wear them for friend's sake--weak from spell of gout. Autograph letter signed, 1 page, integral cover, laminated, watermark (Armed woman and rampant lion with motto Pro Patria GSB). Name on original manuscript appears as "N. W. Dandridge."
